original_title: Xin Lỗi, Anh Chỉ Là Thằng Bán Bánh Giò
overview: Nam is a boy who makes a living cycling around the city selling bánh giò. One day he meets Vy, another seller of street food, and they fall in love. But Vy's mother does not support their relationship.
title: Sorry, I'm Just a Boy Selling Bánh Giò
